sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Schedules an asynchronous job that tries to populate issuer_distinguished_name field in the sys_kmf_certificate table.</description> <name>Populate IssuerDN for Certificates table</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { if (GlidePluginManager.isZboot()) return; //skip for zboot var JOB = "Populate issuer DN in Certificates table"; var JOB_EXECUTION_TIME = new GlideDateTime(); var SCRIPT = "SNC.KMFFixes.populateIssuerDistinguishedNameInCertificatesTable();"; GlideRunScriptJob.scheduleScript(SCRIPT, JOB, JOB_EXECUTION_TIME); gs.info("Successfully scheduled a new job to populate the issuer_distinguished_name field on Certificates table"); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-01-22 20:35:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1840845743333110d57b9473bbb8f2a9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Populate IssuerDN for Certificates table</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Key Management Framework" source="com.glide.kmf.global">ee533ca03c31311068bcf327dfe37f79</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_1840845743333110d57b9473bbb8f2a9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-01-23 18:54:49</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
